themes: concern about reinstating matching fund requirement
impact on underrepresented and underfunded groups
personal experience as a Black woman artist
key_phrases: Do not revert to creating more barriers for independent artists to seek funding
I was around when there was a matching fund
I am hearing you're bringing that back
This is not an equity means to support underrepresented and underfunded people like myself (Black women)
barriers_identified: lack of equitable support for underrepresented and underfunded people
solutions_proposed: Do not bring back the matching fund requirement
